name: Everything Ends In 0
storyline:
Everything Ends In 0 is a game about the end of the world, but you are not a hero destined to save it. In fact, it can't be saved at all - from the moment you start playing, The World is already doomed.

No twist, no fine print, no loopholes, no technicalities. Everything. Will. Die. All you can do is wait for it to be over.

And hey! while you're at it, why not strike up a friendly conversation? I hear you're quite similar to a couple of those girls, and quite intriguing to a couple others. Besides, it's not like the awkward moments will really matter in just a little bit. So listen to them for a while, to pass the time!

Or don't.

Again, it really does not matter.

You are going to die.
summary: The world ends in 1 hour. It can't be saved. Wanna chat?
